Name: Vade Retro : Exorcist
About the game: Vade Retro is a PvP exorcism game up to 4 players. Play as Demon and make your opponents go through hell, or join the exorcist team by choosing a specialty to save victims from the devil's grip in this action-packed experience. Choose your team Play with your friends or with other players online. You can become the demon or play in co-op if you want to be a member of the exorcist team. By joining it, you will have the choice of 3 roles: the priest, the medic or the engineer. The Priest : Speak incantations and defy the laws of nature by summoning spirits. The Medic : Heal your teammates and use your potions to defeat the demon. The Engineer : Use your equipment to help your teammates progress through the game. Progression in the game Take advantage of the different maps, each with its own particularities, in order to unlock spells, potions, or equipment that will help you progress in the game. Game experience Live an experience between horror and action thanks to realistic and captivating universes and dynamic gameplay based on the physics engine.
